title: Will riot ever fix the Mastery/Rune pages not changing bug
body: Most people should know what I am talking about, you go to change your runes/masteries and click on what you want but it doesn't change sometimes :/ resulted in me going in with the wrong setup a few times.

replies.body: Can confirm, just had to jungle with 0-0-0 masteries, was not fun.
happens to me you have to triple chechk to make sure they swapped is annoying as hell
